item.title: Trump says tariffs coming on steel and aluminium
item.description: Imports of the metals will be hit with a 25% levy, a move that will have the biggest impact in Canada.

item.title: Minister blames monkey for Sri Lanka nationwide power cut
item.description: The outage is yet to be fully fixed, meaning hospitals and other buildings are having to use generators.

item.title: Kosovo PM's party leading but short of majority - partial results
item.description: Albin Kurti's party is on track to come first in Kosovo's general election but may not be able to govern alone.

item.title: Ed Sheeran stopped from busking in Bengaluru by Indian police
item.description: Sheeran says it was a planned performance, but police say they refused permission to prevent congestion.

item.title: Ecuador election ends in a 'tie' prompting run-off
item.description: Daniel Noboa and his main challenger Luisa Gonz√°lez received near identical percentages of the vote.
